item.title: OSS PowerShell: Platform Independent Functions
item.description: Just the other day Microsoft released PowerShell as open source with builds available for Windows, Mac OSX, and a few flavors of Linux. Iâ€™m pretty certain the entire community is super hyped at the news. I know I am!
